problem_names:
lemma matroid_ax_3_alt:
  assumes "I \<subseteq> X \<inter> Y"
  shows "rk (X \<union> Y) + rk I \<le> rk X + rk Y"

lemma rk_uniqueness:
  assumes "rk {A,B} = 2" and "rk {C,D} = 2" and "rk {A,B,M} \<le> 2" and "rk {C,D,M} \<le> 2" and
  "rk {A,B,P} \<le> 2" and "rk {C,D,P} \<le> 2" and "rk {A,B,C,D} \<ge> 3"
  shows "rk {M,P} = 1"
lemma rk_ax_dim_alt: "\<exists>A B C D. \<forall>M. rk {A,B,M} \<noteq> 2 \<or> rk {C,D,M} \<noteq> 2"
lemma matroid_ax_2_alt: "rk X \<le> rk (X \<union> {x}) \<and> rk (X \<union> {x}) \<le> rk X + 1"
lemma matroid_ax_3_alt': "rk (X \<union> {y}) = rk (X \<union> {z}) \<longrightarrow> rk (X \<union> {z}) = rk X \<longrightarrow> rk X = rk (X \<union> {y,z})"

lemma rk_ext:
  assumes "rk X \<le> 3"
  shows "\<exists>P. rk(X \<union> {P}) = rk X + 1"

lemma rk_singleton_bis :
  assumes "A = B"
  shows "rk {A, B} = 1"

lemma rk_couple :
  assumes "A \<noteq> B"
  shows "rk {A, B} = 2"

lemma rk_couple_to_singleton :
  assumes "rk {A, B} = 1"
  shows "A = B"

lemma rk_triple_to_rk_couple :
  assumes "rk {A, B, C} = 3"
  shows "rk {A, B} = 2"
translations:
lemma matroid_ax_3_alt:
  assumes "I \<subseteq> X \<inter> Y"
  shows "rk (X \<union> Y) + rk I \<le> rk X + rk Y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk (X \<union> Y) + rk I \<le> rk X + rk Y
by (metis add.commute add_le_cancel_right assms matroid_ax_2 matroid_ax_3 order_trans)

lemma rk_uniqueness:
  assumes "rk {A,B} = 2" and "rk {C,D} = 2" and "rk {A,B,M} \<le> 2" and "rk {C,D,M} \<le> 2" and
  "rk {A,B,P} \<le> 2" and "rk {C,D,P} \<le> 2" and "rk {A,B,C,D} \<ge> 3"
  shows "rk {M,P} = 1"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {M, P} = 1
proof-

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {M, P} = 1
have "{A,B,M} \<union> {A,B,P} = {A,B,M,P}"
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  {A, B, M} \<union> {A, B, P} = {A, B, M, P}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {M, P} = 1
have "rk {A,B,M,P} + rk {A,B} \<le> rk {A,B,M} + rk {A,B,P}"

by (metis (full_types) \<open>{A, B, M} \<union> {A, B, P} = {A, B, M, P}\<close> insert_commute le_inf_iff 
        matroid_ax_3_alt subset_insertI)

proof (state)
this:
  rk {A, B, M, P} + rk {A, B} \<le> rk {A, B, M} + rk {A, B, P}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {M, P} = 1
then
have "rk {A,B,M,P} = 2"

by (smt Un_upper1 Un_upper2 \<open>{A, B, M} \<union> {A, B, P} = {A, B, M, P}\<close> add_diff_cancel_left' 
        add_diff_cancel_right' add_mono antisym assms(1) assms(3) assms(5) le_diff_conv matroid_ax_2)

proof (state)
this:
  rk {A, B, M, P} = 2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {M, P} = 1
have "{C,D,M} \<union> {C,D,P} = {C,D,M,P}"
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  {C, D, M} \<union> {C, D, P} = {C, D, M, P}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {M, P} = 1
have "rk {C,D,M,P} + rk {C,D} \<le> rk {C,D,M} + rk {C,D,P}"

by (metis Un_insert_left Un_upper1 \<open>{C, D, M} \<union> {C, D, P} = {C, D, M, P}\<close> insert_is_Un le_inf_iff 
        matroid_ax_3_alt)

proof (state)
this:
  rk {C, D, M, P} + rk {C, D} \<le> rk {C, D, M} + rk {C, D, P}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {M, P} = 1
then
have i1:"rk {C,D,M,P} + 2 \<le> 4"
using assms(2) assms(4) assms(6)

proof (prove)
using this:
  rk {C, D, M, P} + rk {C, D} \<le> rk {C, D, M} + rk {C, D, P}
  rk {C, D} = 2
  rk {C, D, M} \<le> 2
  rk {C, D, P} \<le> 2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {C, D, M, P} + 2 \<le> 4
by linarith

proof (state)
this:
  rk {C, D, M, P} + 2 \<le> 4

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {M, P} = 1
moreover

proof (state)
this:
  rk {C, D, M, P} + 2 \<le> 4

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {M, P} = 1
have i2:"rk {C,D,M,P} \<ge> 2"
by (metis assms(2) insertI1 insert_subset matroid_ax_2 subset_insertI)

proof (state)
this:
  2 \<le> rk {C, D, M, P}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {M, P} = 1
from i1 and i2

proof (chain)
picking this:
  rk {C, D, M, P} + 2 \<le> 4
  2 \<le> rk {C, D, M, P}
have "rk {C,D,M,P} = 2"
by linarith

proof (state)
this:
  rk {C, D, M, P} = 2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {M, P} = 1
have "rk {A,B,C,D,M,P} \<ge> 3"
by (metis Un_insert_right Un_upper2 assms(7) matroid_ax_2 order_trans sup_bot.right_neutral)

proof (state)
this:
  3 \<le> rk {A, B, C, D, M, P}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {M, P} = 1
have "{A,B,M,P} \<union> {C,D,M,P} = {A,B,C,D,M,P}"
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  {A, B, M, P} \<union> {C, D, M, P} = {A, B, C, D, M, P}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {M, P} = 1
then
have "rk {A,B,C,D,M,P} + rk {M,P} \<le> rk {A,B,M,P} + rk {C,D,M,P}"
by (smt le_inf_iff matroid_ax_3_alt order_trans subset_insertI)

proof (state)
this:
  rk {A, B, C, D, M, P} + rk {M, P} \<le> rk {A, B, M, P} + rk {C, D, M, P}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {M, P} = 1
then
have i3:"rk {A,B,C,D,M,P} + rk {M,P} \<le> 4"
using \<open>rk {A, B, M, P} = 2\<close> \<open>rk {C, D, M, P} = 2\<close>

proof (prove)
using this:
  rk {A, B, C, D, M, P} + rk {M, P} \<le> rk {A, B, M, P} + rk {C, D, M, P}
  rk {A, B, M, P} = 2
  rk {C, D, M, P} = 2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B, C, D, M, P} + rk {M, P} \<le> 4
by linarith

proof (state)
this:
  rk {A, B, C, D, M, P} + rk {M, P} \<le> 4

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {M, P} = 1
have i4:"rk {A,B,C,D,M,P} + rk {M,P} \<ge> 3 + rk{M,P}"
by (simp add: \<open>3 \<le> rk {A, B, C, D, M, P}\<close>)

proof (state)
this:
  3 + rk {M, P} \<le> rk {A, B, C, D, M, P} + rk {M, P}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {M, P} = 1
from i3 and i4

proof (chain)
picking this:
  rk {A, B, C, D, M, P} + rk {M, P} \<le> 4
  3 + rk {M, P} \<le> rk {A, B, C, D, M, P} + rk {M, P}
show "rk {M,P} = 1"

by (metis (no_types, lifting) \<open>rk {A, B, C, D, M, P} + rk {M, P} \<le> rk {A, B, M, P} + rk {C, D, M, P}\<close> 
        \<open>rk {A, B, M, P} = 2\<close> \<open>rk {C, D, M, P} = 2\<close> add_le_cancel_left add_numeral_left antisym 
        insert_absorb2 numeral_Bit1 numeral_One numeral_plus_one one_add_one one_le_numeral 
        order_trans rk_ax_couple rk_ax_singleton)

proof (state)
this:
  rk {M, P} = 1

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

(* The following lemma allows to derive that there exists two lines that do not meet, i.e that belong
to two different planes *)
lemma rk_ax_dim_alt: "\<exists>A B C D. \<forall>M. rk {A,B,M} \<noteq> 2 \<or> rk {C,D,M} \<noteq> 2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>A B C D.
       \<forall>M. rk {A, B, M} \<noteq> 2 \<or> rk {C, D, M} \<noteq> 2
proof-

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>A B C D.
       \<forall>M. rk {A, B, M} \<noteq> 2 \<or> rk {C, D, M} \<noteq> 2
obtain A B C D where f1:"rk {A,B,C,D} \<ge> 4"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>A B C D.
        4 \<le> rk {A, B, C, D} \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using rk_ax_dim

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<exists>A B C D. 4 \<le> rk {A, B, C, D}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>A B C D.
        4 \<le> rk {A, B, C, D} \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  4 \<le> rk {A, B, C, D}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>A B C D.
       \<forall>M. rk {A, B, M} \<noteq> 2 \<or> rk {C, D, M} \<noteq> 2
have "\<forall>M. rk {A,B,M} \<noteq> 2 \<or> rk {C,D,M} \<noteq> 2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>M. rk {A, B, M} \<noteq> 2 \<or> rk {C, D, M} \<noteq> 2
proof

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>M. rk {A, B, M} \<noteq> 2 \<or> rk {C, D, M} \<noteq> 2
fix M

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>M. rk {A, B, M} \<noteq> 2 \<or> rk {C, D, M} \<noteq> 2
have "{A,B,C,D,M} = {A,B,M} \<union> {C,D,M}"
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  {A, B, C, D, M} = {A, B, M} \<union> {C, D, M}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>M. rk {A, B, M} \<noteq> 2 \<or> rk {C, D, M} \<noteq> 2
then
have "rk {A,B,C,D,M} + rk {M} \<le> rk {A,B,M} + rk {C,D,M}"
by (smt le_inf_iff matroid_ax_3_alt order_trans subset_insertI)

proof (state)
this:
  rk {A, B, C, D, M} + rk {M} \<le> rk {A, B, M} + rk {C, D, M}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>M. rk {A, B, M} \<noteq> 2 \<or> rk {C, D, M} \<noteq> 2
then
have "rk {A,B,C,D,M} \<le> 3" if "rk {A,B,M} = 2" and "rk {C,D,M} = 2"

by (smt One_nat_def Suc_leI Suc_le_mono Suc_numeral add_Suc_right add_leD1 add_mono le_antisym 
          not_le numeral_3_eq_3 numeral_One numeral_plus_one one_add_one rk_ax_singleton that(1) 
          that(2))

proof (state)
this:
  \<lbrakk>rk {A, B, M} = 2; rk {C, D, M} = 2\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> rk {A, B, C, D, M} \<le> 3

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>M. rk {A, B, M} \<noteq> 2 \<or> rk {C, D, M} \<noteq> 2
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<lbrakk>rk {A, B, M} = 2; rk {C, D, M} = 2\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> rk {A, B, C, D, M} \<le> 3
have "rk {A,B,C,D} \<le> 3" if "rk {A,B,M} = 2" and "rk {C,D,M} = 2"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>rk {A, B, M} = 2; rk {C, D, M} = 2\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> rk {A, B, C, D, M} \<le> 3

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B, C, D} \<le> 3
by (smt insert_commute matroid_ax_2 order_trans subset_insertI that(1) that(2))

proof (state)
this:
  \<lbrakk>rk {A, B, M} = 2; rk {C, D, M} = 2\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> rk {A, B, C, D} \<le> 3

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>M. rk {A, B, M} \<noteq> 2 \<or> rk {C, D, M} \<noteq> 2
thus "rk {A, B, M} \<noteq> 2 \<or> rk {C, D, M} \<noteq> 2 "

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>rk {A, B, M} = 2; rk {C, D, M} = 2\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> rk {A, B, C, D} \<le> 3

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B, M} \<noteq> 2 \<or> rk {C, D, M} \<noteq> 2
using \<open>4 \<le> rk {A, B, C, D}\<close>

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>rk {A, B, M} = 2; rk {C, D, M} = 2\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> rk {A, B, C, D} \<le> 3
  4 \<le> rk {A, B, C, D}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B, M} \<noteq> 2 \<or> rk {C, D, M} \<noteq> 2
by linarith

proof (state)
this:
  rk {A, B, M} \<noteq> 2 \<or> rk {C, D, M} \<noteq> 2

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>M. rk {A, B, M} \<noteq> 2 \<or> rk {C, D, M} \<noteq> 2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>A B C D.
       \<forall>M. rk {A, B, M} \<noteq> 2 \<or> rk {C, D, M} \<noteq> 2
thus "\<exists>A B C D. \<forall>M. rk {A, B, M} \<noteq> 2 \<or> rk {C, D, M} \<noteq> 2"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>M. rk {A, B, M} \<noteq> 2 \<or> rk {C, D, M} \<noteq> 2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>A B C D.
       \<forall>M. rk {A, B, M} \<noteq> 2 \<or> rk {C, D, M} \<noteq> 2
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>A B C D.
     \<forall>M. rk {A, B, M} \<noteq> 2 \<or> rk {C, D, M} \<noteq> 2

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
lemma rk_empty: "rk {} = 0"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {} = 0
proof-

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {} = 0
have "rk {} \<ge> 0"
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  0 \<le> rk {}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {} = 0
have "rk {} \<le> 0"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {} \<le> 0
by (metis card.empty matroid_ax_1b)

proof (state)
this:
  rk {} \<le> 0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {} = 0
thus "rk {} = 0"

proof (prove)
using this:
  rk {} \<le> 0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {} = 0
by blast

this:
  rk {} = 0

No subgoals!
qed
lemma matroid_ax_2_alt: "rk X \<le> rk (X \<union> {x}) \<and> rk (X \<union> {x}) \<le> rk X + 1"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk X \<le> rk (X \<union> {x}) \<and> rk (X \<union> {x}) \<le> rk X + 1
proof

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. rk X \<le> rk (X \<union> {x})
 2. rk (X \<union> {x}) \<le> rk X + 1
have "X \<subseteq> X \<union> {x}"
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  X \<subseteq> X \<union> {x}

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. rk X \<le> rk (X \<union> {x})
 2. rk (X \<union> {x}) \<le> rk X + 1
thus "rk X \<le> rk (X \<union> {x})"
by (simp add: matroid_ax_2)

proof (state)
this:
  rk X \<le> rk (X \<union> {x})

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk (X \<union> {x}) \<le> rk X + 1
have "rk {x} \<le> 1"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {x} \<le> 1
by (metis One_nat_def card.empty card_Suc_eq insert_absorb insert_not_empty matroid_ax_1b)

proof (state)
this:
  rk {x} \<le> 1

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk (X \<union> {x}) \<le> rk X + 1
thus "rk (X \<union> {x}) \<le> rk X + 1"

proof (prove)
using this:
  rk {x} \<le> 1

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk (X \<union> {x}) \<le> rk X + 1
by (metis add_leD1 le_antisym matroid_ax_3 rk_ax_singleton)

proof (state)
this:
  rk (X \<union> {x}) \<le> rk X + 1

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
lemma matroid_ax_3_alt': "rk (X \<union> {y}) = rk (X \<union> {z}) \<longrightarrow> rk (X \<union> {z}) = rk X \<longrightarrow> rk X = rk (X \<union> {y,z})"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk (X \<union> {y}) = rk (X \<union> {z}) \<longrightarrow>
    rk (X \<union> {z}) = rk X \<longrightarrow>
    rk X = rk (X \<union> {y, z})
proof-

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk (X \<union> {y}) = rk (X \<union> {z}) \<longrightarrow>
    rk (X \<union> {z}) = rk X \<longrightarrow>
    rk X = rk (X \<union> {y, z})
have i1:"rk X \<le> rk (X \<union> {y,z})"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk X \<le> rk (X \<union> {y, z})
using matroid_ax_2

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?X \<subseteq> ?Y \<longrightarrow> rk ?X \<le> rk ?Y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk X \<le> rk (X \<union> {y, z})
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  rk X \<le> rk (X \<union> {y, z})

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk (X \<union> {y}) = rk (X \<union> {z}) \<longrightarrow>
    rk (X \<union> {z}) = rk X \<longrightarrow>
    rk X = rk (X \<union> {y, z})
have i2:"rk X \<ge> rk (X \<union> {y,z})" if "rk (X \<union> {y}) = rk (X \<union> {z})" and "rk (X \<union> {z}) = rk X"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk (X \<union> {y, z}) \<le> rk X
proof-

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk (X \<union> {y, z}) \<le> rk X
have "(X \<union> {y}) \<union> (X \<union> {z}) = X \<union> {y,z}"
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  X \<union> {y} \<union> (X \<union> {z}) = X \<union> {y, z}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk (X \<union> {y, z}) \<le> rk X
then
have "rk (X \<union> {y,z}) + rk X \<le> rk X + rk X"

by (metis \<open>rk (X \<union> {y}) = rk (X \<union> {z})\<close> \<open>rk (X \<union> {z}) = rk X\<close> inf_sup_ord(3) le_inf_iff 
          matroid_ax_3_alt)

proof (state)
this:
  rk (X \<union> {y, z}) + rk X \<le> rk X + rk X

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk (X \<union> {y, z}) \<le> rk X
thus "rk (X \<union> {y,z}) \<le> rk X"

proof (prove)
using this:
  rk (X \<union> {y, z}) + rk X \<le> rk X + rk X

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk (X \<union> {y, z}) \<le> rk X
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  rk (X \<union> {y, z}) \<le> rk X

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

proof (state)
this:
  \<lbrakk>rk (X \<union> {y}) = rk (X \<union> {z});
   rk (X \<union> {z}) = rk X\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> rk (X \<union> {y, z}) \<le> rk X

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk (X \<union> {y}) = rk (X \<union> {z}) \<longrightarrow>
    rk (X \<union> {z}) = rk X \<longrightarrow>
    rk X = rk (X \<union> {y, z})
thus "rk (X \<union> {y}) = rk (X \<union> {z}) \<longrightarrow> rk (X \<union> {z}) = rk X \<longrightarrow> rk X = rk (X \<union> {y, z})"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>rk (X \<union> {y}) = rk (X \<union> {z});
   rk (X \<union> {z}) = rk X\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> rk (X \<union> {y, z}) \<le> rk X

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk (X \<union> {y}) = rk (X \<union> {z}) \<longrightarrow>
    rk (X \<union> {z}) = rk X \<longrightarrow>
    rk X = rk (X \<union> {y, z})
using antisym i1

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>rk (X \<union> {y}) = rk (X \<union> {z});
   rk (X \<union> {z}) = rk X\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> rk (X \<union> {y, z}) \<le> rk X
  \<lbrakk>?x \<le> ?y; ?y \<le> ?x\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> ?x = ?y
  rk X \<le> rk (X \<union> {y, z})

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk (X \<union> {y}) = rk (X \<union> {z}) \<longrightarrow>
    rk (X \<union> {z}) = rk X \<longrightarrow>
    rk X = rk (X \<union> {y, z})
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  rk (X \<union> {y}) = rk (X \<union> {z}) \<longrightarrow>
  rk (X \<union> {z}) = rk X \<longrightarrow> rk X = rk (X \<union> {y, z})

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma rk_ext:
  assumes "rk X \<le> 3"
  shows "\<exists>P. rk(X \<union> {P}) = rk X + 1"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>P. rk (X \<union> {P}) = rk X + 1
proof-

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>P. rk (X \<union> {P}) = rk X + 1
obtain A B C D where "rk {A,B,C,D} \<ge> 4"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>A B C D.
        4 \<le> rk {A, B, C, D} \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using rk_ax_dim

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<exists>A B C D. 4 \<le> rk {A, B, C, D}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>A B C D.
        4 \<le> rk {A, B, C, D} \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  4 \<le> rk {A, B, C, D}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>P. rk (X \<union> {P}) = rk X + 1
have f1:"rk (X \<union> {A, B, C, D}) \<ge> 4"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 4 \<le> rk (X \<union> {A, B, C, D})
by (metis Un_upper2 \<open>4 \<le> rk {A, B, C, D}\<close> matroid_ax_2 sup.coboundedI2 sup.orderE)

proof (state)
this:
  4 \<le> rk (X \<union> {A, B, C, D})

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>P. rk (X \<union> {P}) = rk X + 1

have "rk (X \<union> {A, B, C, D}) = rk X" if "rk(X \<union> {A}) = rk(X \<union> {B})" and "rk(X \<union> {B}) = rk(X \<union> {C})" 
    and "rk(X \<union> {C}) = rk(X \<union> {D})" and "rk(X \<union> {D}) = rk X"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk (X \<union> {A, B, C, D}) = rk X
using matroid_ax_3_alt' that(1) that(2) that(3) that(4)

proof (prove)
using this:
  rk (?X \<union> {?y}) = rk (?X \<union> {?z}) \<longrightarrow>
  rk (?X \<union> {?z}) = rk ?X \<longrightarrow>
  rk ?X = rk (?X \<union> {?y, ?z})
  rk (X \<union> {A}) = rk (X \<union> {B})
  rk (X \<union> {B}) = rk (X \<union> {C})
  rk (X \<union> {C}) = rk (X \<union> {D})
  rk (X \<union> {D}) = rk X

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk (X \<union> {A, B, C, D}) = rk X
by auto
then

have f2:"rk (X \<union> {A, B, C, D}) \<le> 3" if "rk(X \<union> {A}) = rk(X \<union> {B})" and "rk(X \<union> {B}) = rk(X \<union> {C})" 
    and "rk(X \<union> {C}) = rk(X \<union> {D})" and "rk(X \<union> {D}) = rk X"
using assms that(1) that(2) that(3) that(4)

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>rk (X \<union> {A}) = rk (X \<union> {B});
   rk (X \<union> {B}) = rk (X \<union> {C});
   rk (X \<union> {C}) = rk (X \<union> {D});
   rk (X \<union> {D}) = rk X\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> rk (X \<union> {A, B, C, D}) = rk X
  rk X \<le> 3
  rk (X \<union> {A}) = rk (X \<union> {B})
  rk (X \<union> {B}) = rk (X \<union> {C})
  rk (X \<union> {C}) = rk (X \<union> {D})
  rk (X \<union> {D}) = rk X

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk (X \<union> {A, B, C, D}) \<le> 3
by linarith
from f1 and f2

have "False" if "rk(X \<union> {A}) = rk(X \<union> {B})" and "rk(X \<union> {B}) = rk(X \<union> {C})" 
    and "rk(X \<union> {C}) = rk(X \<union> {D})" and "rk(X \<union> {D}) = rk X"
using that(1) that(2) that(3) that(4)

proof (prove)
using this:
  4 \<le> rk (X \<union> {A, B, C, D})
  \<lbrakk>rk (X \<union> {A}) = rk (X \<union> {B});
   rk (X \<union> {B}) = rk (X \<union> {C});
   rk (X \<union> {C}) = rk (X \<union> {D});
   rk (X \<union> {D}) = rk X\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> rk (X \<union> {A, B, C, D}) \<le> 3
  rk (X \<union> {A}) = rk (X \<union> {B})
  rk (X \<union> {B}) = rk (X \<union> {C})
  rk (X \<union> {C}) = rk (X \<union> {D})
  rk (X \<union> {D}) = rk X

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. False
by linarith
then

have "rk (X \<union> {A}) = rk X + 1 \<or> rk (X \<union> {B}) = rk X + 1 \<or> rk (X \<union> {C}) = rk X + 1 \<or> 
    rk (X \<union> {D}) = rk X + 1"

by (smt One_nat_def Suc_le_eq Suc_numeral Un_upper2 \<open>4 \<le> rk {A, B, C, D}\<close> 
        \<open>\<lbrakk>rk (X \<union> {A}) = rk (X \<union> {B}); rk (X \<union> {B}) = rk (X \<union> {C}); rk (X \<union> {C}) = rk (X \<union> {D}); rk (X \<union> {D}) = rk X\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> rk (X \<union> {A, B, C, D}) = rk X\<close> 
        add.right_neutral add_Suc_right assms antisym_conv1 matroid_ax_2 matroid_ax_2_alt 
        not_less semiring_norm(2) semiring_norm(8) sup.coboundedI2 sup.orderE)

proof (state)
this:
  rk (X \<union> {A}) = rk X + 1 \<or>
  rk (X \<union> {B}) = rk X + 1 \<or>
  rk (X \<union> {C}) = rk X + 1 \<or> rk (X \<union> {D}) = rk X + 1

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>P. rk (X \<union> {P}) = rk X + 1
thus "\<exists>P . rk (X \<union> {P}) = rk X + 1"

proof (prove)
using this:
  rk (X \<union> {A}) = rk X + 1 \<or>
  rk (X \<union> {B}) = rk X + 1 \<or>
  rk (X \<union> {C}) = rk X + 1 \<or> rk (X \<union> {D}) = rk X + 1

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>P. rk (X \<union> {P}) = rk X + 1
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>P. rk (X \<union> {P}) = rk X + 1

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
lemma rk_singleton : "\<forall>P. rk {P} = 1"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>P. rk {P} = 1
proof

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P. rk {P} = 1
fix P

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P. rk {P} = 1
have f1:"rk {P} \<le> 1"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {P} \<le> 1
by (metis One_nat_def card.empty card_Suc_eq insert_absorb insert_not_empty matroid_ax_1b)

proof (state)
this:
  rk {P} \<le> 1

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P. rk {P} = 1
have f2:"rk {P} \<ge> 1"
using rk_ax_singleton
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  1 \<le> rk {P}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P. rk {P} = 1
from f1 and f2

proof (chain)
picking this:
  rk {P} \<le> 1
  1 \<le> rk {P}
show "rk {P} = 1"
using antisym

proof (prove)
using this:
  rk {P} \<le> 1
  1 \<le> rk {P}
  \<lbrakk>?x \<le> ?y; ?y \<le> ?x\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> ?x = ?y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {P} = 1
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  rk {P} = 1

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma rk_singleton_bis :
  assumes "A = B"
  shows "rk {A, B} = 1"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B} = 1
by (simp add: assms rk_singleton)

lemma rk_couple :
  assumes "A \<noteq> B"
  shows "rk {A, B} = 2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B} = 2
proof-

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B} = 2
have f1:"rk {A, B} \<le> 2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B} \<le> 2
by (metis insert_is_Un matroid_ax_2_alt one_add_one rk_singleton)

proof (state)
this:
  rk {A, B} \<le> 2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B} = 2
have f2:"rk {A, B} \<ge> 2"
by (simp add: assms rk_ax_couple)

proof (state)
this:
  2 \<le> rk {A, B}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B} = 2
from f1 and f2

proof (chain)
picking this:
  rk {A, B} \<le> 2
  2 \<le> rk {A, B}
show "?thesis"
by (simp add: f1 le_antisym)

proof (state)
this:
  rk {A, B} = 2

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
lemma rk_triple_le : "rk {A, B, C} \<le> 3"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B, C} \<le> 3

by (metis Suc_numeral Un_commute insert_absorb2 insert_is_Un linear matroid_ax_2_alt numeral_2_eq_2 
      numeral_3_eq_3 numeral_le_one_iff numeral_plus_one rk_couple rk_singleton semiring_norm(70))

  assumes "rk {A, B} = 1"
  shows "A = B"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A = B
proof-

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A = B
have "rk {A, B} = 2" if "A \<noteq> B"

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B} = 2
using rk_couple

using this:
  ?A \<noteq> ?B \<Longrightarrow> rk {?A, ?B} = 2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B} = 2
by (simp add: that)

this:
  A \<noteq> B \<Longrightarrow> rk {A, B} = 2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A = B
thus "A = B"

proof (prove)
using this:
  A \<noteq> B \<Longrightarrow> rk {A, B} = 2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A = B
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  A \<noteq> B \<Longrightarrow> rk {A, B} = 2
  rk {A, B} = 1

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A = B
by auto

proof (state)

No subgoals!

lemma rk_triple_to_rk_couple :
  assumes "rk {A, B, C} = 3"
  shows "rk {A, B} = 2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B} = 2
proof-

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B} = 2
have "rk {A, B} \<le> 2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B} \<le> 2
using matroid_ax_1b

proof (prove)
using this:
  rk ?X \<le> card ?X

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B} \<le> 2
by (metis one_le_numeral rk_ax_couple rk_couple rk_singleton_bis)

proof (state)
this:
  rk {A, B} \<le> 2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B} = 2
have "rk {A, B, C} \<le> 2" if "rk {A, B} = 1"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B, C} \<le> 2
using matroid_ax_2_alt[of "{A, B}" C]

proof (prove)
using this:
  rk {A, B} \<le> rk ({A, B} \<union> {C}) \<and>
  rk ({A, B} \<union> {C}) \<le> rk {A, B} + 1

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B, C} \<le> 2
by (simp add: insert_commute that)

proof (state)
this:
  rk {A, B} = 1 \<Longrightarrow> rk {A, B, C} \<le> 2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B} = 2
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  rk {A, B} = 1 \<Longrightarrow> rk {A, B, C} \<le> 2
have "rk {A, B} \<ge> 2"
using assms rk_ax_couple rk_singleton_bis
by force

proof (state)
this:
  2 \<le> rk {A, B}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B} = 2
thus "rk {A, B} = 2"
by (simp add: \<open>rk {A, B} \<le> 2\<close> le_antisym)

proof (state)
this:
  rk {A, B} = 2

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
